channel.title: Charlamagne on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race

item.title: Charlamagne predicts 'de-MAGA-ification' in future, like how 'Nazi ideology was outlawed' in postwar Germany
item.description: Charlamagne compared the Trump regime to Nazi Germany, predicting future prosecution of leaders while defending Second Amendment rights after activist Alex Pretti's shooting death.
